TopicTitle: Main menu not showing up when booting game

Articles.Content:
When I boot up KSP it will get to the point where the main menu should be and it does not show. and when kerbal changelog is installed i can not click on anything in it.

 

This is the log https://www.dropbox.com/s/ww4q77j4go4ixir/Player.log?dl=0
and this is the mod list https://www.dropbox.com/s/4kfh64272toyfc0/checking.txt?dl=0

This looks likely to be a problem: 

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at News+<GetNews>d__4.MoveNext () [0x00130] in <430de56ad0f94f6ba23dca9efcbd2d75>:0
  at UnityEngine.SetupCoroutine.InvokeMoveNext (System.Collections.IEnumerator enumerator, System.IntPtr returnValueAddress) [0x00026] in <12e76cd50cc64cf19e759e981cb725af>:0

I have no idea what it means and a Google search doesn't turn anything up.

My only suggestion is to remove all of your mods and start the game, to make sure it's not a game problem. If it is, then we'll know something.

If it's not a game problem it's a mod problem. Remove HALF of your mods, then try to start the game. If it starts, you know the offending mod is in the list of mods you removed. If it fails, you know the offending mod is in the list of mods you kept.

Repeat this process with the list of mods that has the problem, until you've narrowed it down to 1 mod that is causing the problem.

This sounds daunting but it's really not. You have 86 mods so you only need to cut them in half 7 times before you're down to 1 (86 to 43 to 22 to 11 to 6 to 3 to 2 to 1)

Edited October 26, 2022 by Superfluous J

1 hour ago, Superfluous J said:

thanks i will give that a shot tomorrow, then ill get back

This happens for me from time to time. I use a bunch of mods, but the main problem is I am an impatient multi-tasker and will use the Windows key to go back to the desktop while Kerbal Space Program loads. When I go back to the game after it has finished loading, the menu is gone. Good news is the game is fully loaded and functioning - but without the first menu on the opening screen.

Believe it or not, the menu is still there, but you just cannot see it. If you click in the general area of the text, it will still allow you to advance to the next screen. The menu for that screen will be there - just as normal.

figured out the mod that was causing the issue is TUFX

only module manger and TUFX were installed via ckan on ksp 1.12.3

and this is the log file https://www.dropbox.com/s/aoh1i5o22gkehe3/Player-prev.log?dl=0
